articles.description: This year, scientists learned more about COVID-19 as the virus continued to circulate and mutate. The cicadas emerged from underground, and Perseverance landed on Mars. Laura Helmuth, editor in chief of Scientific American, talks about the year in science. An…

articles.content:
Married At First Sight couple Martha Kalifatidis and Michael Brunelli have tested positive for coronavirus, just days after returning from North America.
